name: flatter
effect: Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.
short_effect: Raises the target’s Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
